name: payments-api
notes: The Payments API lets developers take and manage payments

endpoints.name: List payments
endpoints.notes: Retrieves a list of payments taken by the account making the request.

endpoints.name: Create payment
endpoints.notes: Creates a payment using the provided source.

endpoints.name: Cancel payment
endpoints.notes: Cancels (voids) a payment identified by the idempotency key that is specified in the request.

endpoints.name: Get payment
endpoints.notes: Retrieves details for a specific payment.

endpoints.name: Update payment
endpoints.notes: Updates a payment with the APPROVED status.
